name: Custom Dokan Fields
author: sysbasics

sections.description:
Custom Dokan Fields

Customize your default Customize Dokan Dashboard Endpoints. Reorder them , hide existing core endpoints.

Custom Dokan Fields features

Dokan Custom Fields Pro Description
Our Dokan Custom fields Pro Plugin Lets you Add new custom fields in dokan product edit . You can reorder them using our Drag and Drop Admin UI .Plugin Supports 15 types of widely used custom fields. Also with purchase of our woocommerce checkout field editor plugin you will get 6 months included support and lifetime updates.

Our Custom Dokan Fields Pro Features
Conditional Checkout Fields – show/hide fields based on value of other checkout fields.

Supported Custom Fields By Dokan Custom Fields Pro Plugin
Text
Textarea
Password
Paragraph text field
Heading
Dropdown Select
Multi Select with select2 jquery
Datepicker
Checkbox
Radio
Email
Telephone Number
Number
Date Time picker
Time picker
Date Range picker
Date Time Range picker.

Color Image Variation Swatches For WooCommerce Plugin

Color Image Variation Swatches For WooCommerce For WooCommerce Plugin allows you to convert your regular woocommerce default dropdown into nicely looking color/image/taxt select

Checkout Color Image Variation Swatches For WooCommerce

short_description: Custom Dokan Fields Plugin is a comprehensive tool for adding, editing, and managing additional fields on dokan product edit page.
